scripts.migration:generate:test: export SHOP_ENV=.env.test && yarn ts-node migration generate
scripts.migration:run:test: export SHOP_ENV=.env.test && yarn ts-node migration run
scripts.migration:revert:test: export SHOP_ENV=.env.test && yarn ts-node migration revert
scripts.migration:generate:copy: export SHOP_ENV=.env.copy && yarn ts-node migration generate
scripts.migration:run:copy: export SHOP_ENV=.env.copy && yarn ts-node migration run
scripts.migration:revert:copy: export SHOP_ENV=.env.copy && yarn ts-node migration revert
scripts.migration:generate:prod: export SHOP_ENV=.env && yarn ts-node migration generate
scripts.migration:run:prod: export SHOP_ENV=.env && yarn ts-node migration run
scripts.migration:revert:prod: export SHOP_ENV=.env && yarn ts-node migration revert
